column4: Anyone know why unity won't load.  Compiz says it is because I am using software rendering but every test I've done shows I'm using hardware rendering?
what graphics card are you using?
have you run the restricted driver search?
ok log out, and at the bottom select ubuntu classic (dont know my way around unit)
is there a way to search?
ok log out of the session. bottom of screen select classic theme. log in again and look for System->....
so it also did not find any?
check intel website for current linux driver
check if they are legacy drivers or if current kernel and X supports them

yes this is a common problem with older graphics cards that are no longer fully supported, best is to stay away from unit and compiz, so log out, then bottom of login screen select the classic ubuntu and log back in
having done that check Compiz themes are fully turned off. == much faster pc
